text: 'This fellow may be very clever.' I said to myself, 'but he is certainly very conceited'.
author: dr_watson

text: Education never ends, Watson. It is a series of lessons with the greatest for the last.
author: sherlock_holmes

text: You remind me of Edgar Allan Poeâ€™s Dupin.  I had no idea that such individuals did exist out of stories.
author: dr_watson
